definition: to control flow/to choke/weir valve/a throttle/a choke
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
lit. to open a water source and reduce outflow (idiom); to increase income and save on spending/to broaden the sources of income and economize on expenditure
a throttle
full throttle/top speed
throttle pedal/accelerator

sentences.english: Also, a formula calculating the pressure drop of series throttle holes in the liquid propellant transporting sys…
sentences.chinese: 文中还给出了液路系统中各串联节流孔压降公式。

sentences.english: Based on isenthalpic process the dynamic model of adjustable J-T valve was build up.
sentences.chinese: 根据等焓过程建立了可调节流阀动态模型。

sentences.english: Regular style globe valves are suitable for moderate throttling applications.
sentences.chinese: 一般的截止阀适合用于适度的节流应用。

sentences.english: The tool is fitted with a progressive throttle action, which allows a low speed with a small throttle opening.
sentences.chinese: 此工具有部进节流装置，当节流阀小开时速度较慢。

sentences.english: The tool is fitted with a progressive throttle action, which allows a low speed with a small throttle opening.
sentences.chinese: 此工具有部进节流装置，当节流阀小开时速度较慢。

sentences.english: But many think the savings calculations are slapdash.
sentences.chinese: 但是很多人认为节流计算并不仔细。

sentences.english: The aperture restrictor is an important component in the hydrostatic support system.
sentences.chinese: 液体静压支承中节流器是不可缺少的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Gives a research method for the throttle aperture when the annular slice deformation of hydro-pneumatic spring is considered.
sentences.chinese: 提出油气弹簧环形阀片变形缝隙节流的一种研究方法。

sentences.english: This choke can be used to regulate either the pressure in the LTS or the flow rate.
sentences.chinese: 节流件还能用来调节低温分离器压力或流量。

sentences.english: Every successive element of fluid undergoes the throttling process in a continuous stream.
sentences.chinese: 在连续的流动中，每一流体元相继地经历节流过程。

sentences.english: One example of throttling utility is the database backup.
sentences.chinese: 进行节流的实用程序的一个例子是数据库备份。

sentences.english: Mount upper die lip after mounting restrictor bar.
sentences.chinese: 节流棒安装完成后再安装上模唇。

sentences.english: Throttle body made from high temperature and high pressure liquid into the evaporator of refrigeration.
sentences.chinese: 节流机构使制冷从高温高压液体进入蒸发器。

sentences.english: Throttling index plate and mounting hardware is included.
sentences.chinese: 包括节流刻度板和安装五金件。

sentences.english: After the holidays, many are ready to take control of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 在节后，他们很多人才在生活中开始开源节流。

definition: lit. to open a water source and reduce outflow (idiom); to increase income and save on spending/to broaden the sources of income and economize on expenditure
to expand one's financial resources/abbr. for 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]
to assess one's income and spend accordingly (idiom); to live within one's means/You can only spend what you earn.
expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
income does not cover expenditure/unable to make ends meet
surplus/profit
to deposit money/to save money
to spend/to pay out/expense
to take control of/to manage/to curb
to deposit money/to save/savings
lit. eating away next year's food in advance/fig. to dip into the next month's check/live now, pay later
lit. just sitting and eating, one can deplete even a mountain of wealth (idiom)/fig. to spend one's money without generating any income
to keep accounts/bookkeeping/to charge to an account
to pay (expenses)/expenses/(old) to dismiss (an employee)
to save money
to spend money
